Serial.summary: NOTE Experimental The Serial interface of the Web Serial API provides attributes and methods for finding and connecting to serial ports from a web page.

SerialRequestPort.summary: NOTE Experimental The Serial.requestPort() method of the interface presents the user with a dialog asking them to select a serial device to connect to. It returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with an instance of representing the device chosen by the user.
SerialRequestPort.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with an instance of .

SerialGetPorts.summary: NOTE Experimental The getPorts() method of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with an array of objects representing serial ports connected to the host which the origin has permission to access.
SerialGetPorts.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with an array of objects.
